summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Twenty-sixth Avenue from East Alder Street to a point 100 feet north of East Marion Street in the City of Seattle, constructing a sewer under Ordinance No. 15796, creating Local Improvement District No. 1475 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
